name: The Laundry List
description:
The Laundry List is a game jam entry for the 2023 Annual Haxe Jam  made with HaxeFlixel!

The game jam's theme was Again and Again, where the focus of the game was to create a game that would feature a lot of repetition. What's more repetitive than doing daily chores and tasks for better quality of living? Nothing!

The Laundry List puts you into the shoes of one mysterious stranger who's desire is just to live a clean and happy life. But sometimes life carries you away, along with all your laundry! Grab your clothes and put them in the basket, wash the dishes and make your bed. So many tasks go unfinished and time is constantly ticking away. Do what it takes to survive the grime of life!

Credits:

PlayStateWolf: Artist
